name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ETH Ticker | Ethereum Ticker | Token Ticker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ethereum and Token exchange price ticker. Displays the current price on the badge icon, Chart and Alert notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is made possible thanks to *perp.exchange*, on-chain leveraged trading made simple.

Ethereum and Token exchange price ticker extension.
Supported markets/exchanges: Binance, Bitfinex, Bittrex, CoinbasePro, Kraken and others ...
Alerts for when the ticker price between last value exceeds some user defined threshold.
 
Supported pairs: ETH/BTC, ETH/USDT, ETH/USD, ETH/EUR, ETH/GBP, ETH/JPY, ETH/EOS and lot of currencies
